title: @Jordan B Peterson vulnerable comments on Jesus Christ- "it's too terrifying."
description:
A clip of @Jordan B Peterson  & @Jonathan Pageau  recent conversation that I found particularly moving.

Peterson embodies in this clip what the proper response is to the genuine revelation of Christ, "it's too terrifying." 

As someone who's obsessed with finding that revelation of Christ embedded in our cultural stories, I found this conversation compelling.
----------

Deep Talks:Exploring Theology & Meaning Making podcast:

https://deeptalkstheologypodcast.podbean.com/
